name: Zucchiniverse
description:
Welcome to the Metaverse 🥒🌐

Zucchiniverse is a visual novel about finding your friends in the Metaverse.

Along the way you’ll meet Mark Zucchiniberg who will guide you on your journey. Experience the "All Alone" entertainment package with three familiar faces from across the Chonkerverse.  Can you find all the secrets that Plaza holds?

*Note: This game was made mainly as an April Fool's joke / celebration for our team. Congrats if you understand any of the in-jokes ;0

Credits

Eli Miller - Creative Lead, Narrative
Michael Sim - Programming, Production
Angela Do - Character Art

Weston Cook - *True Ending*
Special Thanks - Andrew Xu, Victor Dong,  Sandy Sang, Angela Jiang

FOLLOW US: Twitter | Linktree
Zucchiniverse OST available on Bandcamp
Let us know what you think with a Rating or Comment below :D

Game developed as part of April Fools 2022 NaNoRenO 2022
Originally published on April 1, 2022
